name: Twitter New Followers
description: Discover who your latest Twitter followers are, and compare the number of new followers to the previous 30 days. Originates from the Gallery.

zapier-01.name: Twitter New Followers via Zapier
zapier-01.description: Use Zapier to get your Twitter followers. Originates from the Gallery.

datasourceConfigModel.description:
This Klip relies on Zapier to update the data source. After adding the Klip you will need to setup this Zap

Note: When you first add this Klip data will not be shown because the data source is empty. The data begins accumulating once you setup the Zap and includes all new followers that are added after that.
